enchantment.dadobugbedrockores.arcane_ex: Picks up bedrock ores in block form.
enchantment.dadobugbedrockores.extractio: Extracts the regenerative core of bedrock ores.
enchantment.dadobugbedrockores.gentle_mi: Greatly increases efficiency for finite regenerative ores.
enchantment.dadobugbedrockores.shatterin: Greatly increases the yield of regenerative ores, at the cost of efficiency.
